<dialog height="506" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="0" top="0" width="420"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Restrore Databse from backup"><properties><entry name="text">Restrore Databse from backup</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties><text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_USERNAMEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="SQL User" tooltip="Username used to authenticate with the DB server." upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>

<properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry> <entry name="text">Tape sources</entry> <entry name="multiselect">0</entry> <entry name="separator">;</entry> <entry name="len"/> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_RESTORE_FROM_TAPESs.00</entry> <entry name="inputassistance">0</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="upper">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="showaspassword">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Specifies tape device(s) as source(s) for restore</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="regex"/> <entry name="required">0</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="multiline">0</entry> <entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> </properties> </text><dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_VERIFY_CHECKSUMs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Verify checksum" tooltip="Specifies that backup checksums must be verified and, if the backup lacks backup checksums, causes the restore operation to fail with a message indicating that checksums are not present. The default behavior is to verify checksums if they are present and proceed without verification if they are not present" required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="text">Verify checksum</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_VERIFY_CHECKSUMs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Specifies that backup checksums must be verified and, if the backup lacks backup checksums, causes the restore operation to fail with a message indicating that checksums are not present. The default behavior is to verify checksums if they are present and proceed without verification if they are not present</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_STOP_ON_ERRORs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Stop on error" tooltip="Specifies that the restore operation stops with the first error encountered. This is the default behavior." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="text">Stop on error</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_STOP_ON_ERRORs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Specifies that the restore operation stops with the first error encountered. This is the default behavior.</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup><text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_BACKUPSET_FILE_NRs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="File number in Backup set" tooltip="Identifies the backup set to be restored. For example, a backup_set_file_number of 1 indicates the first backup set on the backup medium and a backup_set_file_number of 2 indicates the second backup set. When not specified, the default is 1" upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>
<properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_NUMERIC</entry> <entry name="text">File number in Backup set</entry> <entry name="multiselect">0</entry> <entry name="separator">;</entry> <entry name="len"/> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_BACKUPSET_FILE_NRs.00</entry> <entry name="inputassistance">0</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="upper">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="showaspassword">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Identifies the backup set to be restored. For example, a backup_set_file_number of 1 indicates the first backup set on the backup medium and a backup_set_file_number of 2 indicates the second backup set. When not specified, the default is 1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="regex"/> <entry name="required">0</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="multiline">0</entry> <entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> </properties> </text><text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_MEDIANAMEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Name of media" tooltip="Specifies the name for the media. If provided, the media name must match the media name on the backup volumes; otherwise, the restore operation terminates. If no media name is given in the RESTORE statement, the check for a matching media name on the backup volumes is not performed." upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>
<properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry> <entry name="text">Name of media</entry> <entry name="multiselect">0</entry> <entry name="separator">;</entry> <entry name="len"/> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_MEDIANAMEs.00</entry> <entry name="inputassistance">0</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="upper">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="showaspassword">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Specifies the name for the media. If provided, the media name must match the media name on the backup volumes; otherwise, the restore operation terminates. If no media name is given in the RESTORE statement, the check for a matching media name on the backup volumes is not performed.</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="regex"/> <entry name="required">0</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="multiline">0</entry> <entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> </properties> </text><dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_RECOVERYs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Roll back uncommitted transactions" tooltip="Instructs the restore operation to roll back any uncommitted transactions. After the recovery process, the database is ready for use. Default: yes (recovery)" required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="text">Roll back uncommitted transactions</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_RECOVERYs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Instructs the restore operation to roll back any uncommitted transactions. After the recovery process, the database is ready for use. Default: yes (recovery)</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_PARTIALs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Partial restore" tooltip="Specifies a partial restore operation that restores the primary filegroup and any specified secondary filegroup(s). The PARTIAL option implicitly selects the primary filegroup; specifying FILEGROUP = 'PRIMARY' is unnecessary. To restore a secondary filegroup, you must explicitly specify the filegroup using the FILE option or FILEGROUP option." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="text">Partial restore</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_PARTIALs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Specifies a partial restore operation that restores the primary filegroup and any specified secondary filegroup(s). The PARTIAL option implicitly selects the primary filegroup; specifying FILEGROUP = 'PRIMARY' is unnecessary. To restore a secondary filegroup, you must explicitly specify the filegroup using the FILE option or FILEGROUP option.</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_REPLACEs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Replace existing database" tooltip="Specifies that SQL Server should create the specified database and its related files even if another database already exists with the same name. In such a case, the existing database is deleted." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="text">Replace existing database</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_REPLACEs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Specifies that SQL Server should create the specified database and its related files even if another database already exists with the same name. In such a case, the existing database is deleted.</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_RESTARTs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Restart an interrupted restore" tooltip="Specifies that SQL Server should restart a restore operation that has been interrupted. RESTART restarts the restore operation at the point it was interrupted." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="text">Restart an interrupted restore</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_RESTARTs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Specifies that SQL Server should restart a restore operation that has been interrupted. RESTART restarts the restore operation at the point it was interrupted.</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_TAPE_REWINDs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Rewind tape" tooltip="These options are used only for TAPE devices. If a nontape device is being used, these options are ignored. Specifies that SQL Server will release and rewind the tape. REWIND is the default." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="text">Rewind tape</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_TAPE_REWINDs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">These options are used only for TAPE devices. If a nontape device is being used, these options are ignored. Specifies that SQL Server will release and rewind the tape. REWIND is the default.</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DB_TAPE_UNLOADs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Unload tape" tooltip="These options are used only for TAPE devices. If a nontape device is being used, these options are ignored. Specifies that the tape is automatically rewound and unloaded when the backup is finished. UNLOAD is the default when a session begins." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="text">Unload tape</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_DB_TAPE_UNLOADs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">These options are used only for TAPE devices. If a nontape device is being used, these options are ignored. Specifies that the tape is automatically rewound and unloaded when the backup is finished. UNLOAD is the default when a session begins.</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup></readpanel></dialog>
